resources.string: FilkomSoul is an application for Faculty of Computer Science, Brawijaya University students to care more about mental health through:
Sorry, this data can\'t be empty
I understand the screening results in FilkomSoul are not definitive results
Make sure the internet connection is connected for a better update data
Make sure the internet connection is connected to access news
Make sure you have filled in the gender
Make sure you have agreed to the application terms
FilkomSoul is a FILKOM student application to check their depression level with Depression Screening.
Lets get early detection so you are aware of your condition

The depression screening test using the USDI (University Student Depression Inventory) has a positive impact on students by increasing awareness of mental well-being, detecting early symptoms of depression, and providing the basis for the FILKOM UB counseling service program. The goal to be achieved is for students to get early support and increase efforts in managing mental well-being.
Contact FILKOM UB Counseling Service Through
Are you sure you want to exit application?
Are you sure you want to out of the screening test? Progress will be lost

FilkomSoul is an application developed as part of the thesis research of students at the Faculty of Computer Science, Brawijaya University. This application is for FILKOM UB students who need mental health screening, mental health education, and integration with FILKOM UB counseling services. This application was possible thanks to assistance from the Counseling Service, lecturers and staff, as well as the FILKOM UB IT team.
Alexander Rama Giofran Informatics Engineering 2020 Bandung, March 28th 2002 Android Developer
30 questions to measure lethargy, academic motivation, and emotions with options:
Almost Never \n(Several times a year / less)

string-array.name: question
string-array.item: I am more tired than usual
I don\'t have the energy to study at my usual level
My energy is low
I find it difficult to concentrate
I don\'t feel rested even after sleeping
The challenges I faced in college overwhelmed me
My mood affects my ability to carry out assigned tasks
Daily work takes longer than usual
My educational studies are disrupted by disturbing thoughts
I wonder if life is worth living
I feel worthless
I have thought about killing myself
I feel like no one cares about me
I feel empty
I feel sad
I am worried, I can\'t do anything
Activities that I used to enjoy no longer interest me
I feel like I can\'t control my emotions
I spend more time alone than usual
I feel disappointed in myself
I feel self-conscious when I am around other people
I didn\'t handle the problem well
I think other people are better than me
I have no desire to go to college
I rarely attend lectures like I used to
I dont feel motivated to study
I feel like going to college is pointless
I am having trouble starting a task
I dont find studying as interesting as before
I am having problems completing my study assignments

resources.string: Hasil pengisian kuesioner depresi menunjukkan anda mengalami gejala depresi yang sangat berat berdasarkan hasil skor antara 119 sampai 150. Anda mengalami kesulitan sangat berat dalam %1$s dalam diri. Melakukan konseling dan bantuan professional sangat dibutuhkan. Segera hubungi ahli kesehatan mental, teman, atau keluarga untuk mendapatkan dukungan dan bimbingan.

Hasil pengisian kuesioner depresi menunjukkan anda mengalami gejala depresi yang berat berdasarkan hasil skor antara 95 sampai 118. Anda mulai berjuang dan menghadapi tantangan %1$s dalam diri. Sangat penting untuk memprioritaskan kesehatan mental anda, mencari bantuan profesional, dan berkomunikasi dengan orang terkasih.

Hasil pengisian kuesioner depresi menunjukkan anda mengalami gejala depresi yang sedang berdasarkan hasil skor antara 74 sampai 94. Anda mulai mendapati kendala %1$s dalam diri. Dianjurkan untuk memperhatikan Kesehatan mental anda, menyesuaikan gaya hidup, dan mencari dukungan dari teman, keluarga, atau ahli kesehatan mental.

Hasil pengisian kuesioner depresi menunjukkan anda mengalami gejala depresi yang ringan berdasarkan hasil skor dibawah 73. Anda masih dapat mengelola %1$s dalam diri. Penting untuk terus mempraktikkan kebiasaan kesehatan mental yang baik dan mencari dukungan jika diperlukan.
